DOC.brief_summary: The study compare treatment DermACELL conventional care diabetic foot ulcer ( DFU ) venous stasis ulcer ( VSU ) .
DOC.brief_title: DermACELL Subjects With Chronic Wounds Lower Extremities
DOC.detailed_description: This study design demonstrate effectiveness DermACELL treatment chronic wound low extremity . DermACELL compare conventional care subject diabetic foot ulcer ( DFU ) subject venous stasis ulcer ( VSU ) . In addition , DermACELL compare active comparator , GraftJacket , subject diabetic foot ulcer . DermACELL GraftJacket make donate human skin ( dermis ) . These product process cell remove bacteria virus destroyed . This processing provide supporting structure , acellular dermal matrix , cell migrate divide wound heal process .
DOC.criteria: Male female age 21 80 able provide inform consent , available weekly clinic visit willing comply offload requirement treatment ; If diabetic , stable dose medication treat diabetes less 30 day ; Have DFU present least 30 day VSU present least 60 day ; Have DFU VSU infect ; Are pregnant lactating ; Have allergy sensitive one follow antibiotic : lincomycin , gentamicin , polymyxin B , vancomycin ; Have sensitivity polysorbate 20 , Nlauroyl sarcosinate , benzonase glycerol ; Have HbA1c level great 12 % within past 90 day ; Have liver function test kidney function test elevate ; Have know suspect disease immune system ; Have surgery past 30 day increase blood flow leg foot ; Have cancer connective tissue disease ( i.e . lupus , rheumatoid arthritis ) ; Have undergo wound heal treatment live skin equivalent ( i.e. , Dermagraft® , Apligraf® , TheraSkin® , Oasis® , GraftJacket® , Integra® , Alloderm® ) topical growth factor last 4 week ; Have active Charcot disease , weaken bone foot occur people significant nerve damage ( neuropathy ) ;
